sentences.sContent: A man who sat himself solidly in an arm-chair, and looked into the fire, so--A shower of ideas fell perpetually from some very high Heaven down through his mind.
sentences.sContent_eng: A man who sat himself solidly in an arm-chair, and looked into the fire, so--A shower of ideas fell perpetually from some very high Heaven down through his mind.
sentences.sCn: 这个人稳稳地坐在扶手椅里，凝视着炉火，就这样——一阵骤雨似的念头源源不断地从某个非常高的天国倾泻而下，进入他的头脑。

synos.tran: 坚固地；坚硬地；团结一致地

words.tran: 固体的；可靠的；立体的；结实的；一致的
凝固，团结（solidify的过去式和过去分词形式）
使凝固（solidify的ing形式）；使团结；使充实
